content.query:
IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.external_file_formats WHERE name = 'SynapseParquetFormat') 
	CREATE EXTERNAL FILE FORMAT [SynapseParquetFormat] 
	WITH ( FORMAT_TYPE = PARQUET)
GO

IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.external_data_sources WHERE name = 'raw_sadevbrdatalakemalwee_dfs_core_windows_net') 
	CREATE EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE [raw_sadevbrdatalakemalwee_dfs_core_windows_net] 
	WITH (
		LOCATION   = 'https://sadevbrdatalakemalwee.dfs.core.windows.net/raw', 
	)
Go

CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE RawDataOrderPaymentVtex (
	[orderId] varchar(8000),
	[items] varchar(8000),
	[isActive] varchar(8000),
	[transactionId] varchar(8000),
	[merchantName] varchar(8000),
	[id] varchar(8000),
	[paymentSystem] varchar(8000),
	[paymentSystemName] varchar(8000),
	[value] varchar(8000),
	[installments] varchar(8000),
	[referenceValue] varchar(8000),
	[cardHolder] varchar(8000),
	[cardNumber] varchar(8000),
	[firstDigits] varchar(8000),
	[lastDigits] varchar(8000),
	[cvv2] varchar(8000),
	[expireMonth] varchar(8000),
	[expireYear] varchar(8000),
	[url] varchar(8000),
	[giftCardId] varchar(8000),
	[giftCardName] varchar(8000),
	[giftCardCaption] varchar(8000),
	[redemptionCode] varchar(8000),
	[group] varchar(8000),
	[tid] varchar(8000),
	[dueDate] varchar(8000),
	[giftCardProvider] varchar(8000),
	[giftCardAsDiscount] varchar(8000),
	[koinUrl] varchar(8000),
	[accountId] varchar(8000),
	[parentAccountId] varchar(8000),
	[bankIssuedInvoiceIdentificationNumber] varchar(8000),
	[bankIssuedInvoiceIdentificationNumberFormatted] varchar(8000),
	[bankIssuedInvoiceBarCodeNumber] varchar(8000),
	[bankIssuedInvoiceBarCodeType] varchar(8000)
	)
	WITH (
	LOCATION = 'brazil/vtex/VtextOrderpayment.parquet',
	DATA_SOURCE = [raw_sadevbrdatalakemalwee_dfs_core_windows_net],
	FILE_FORMAT = [SynapseParquetFormat]
	)
GO

SELECT TOP 100 * FROM RawDataOrderPaymentVtex
GO
